channel.title: shortcuts on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in shortcuts on Alok's Blog

item.title: Emacs Shortcuts
item.description: Emacs Shortcuts Spc f d –> search for files in dired Spc : –> main command Spc g s –> git status Spc n n –> Capture template Spc n a –> agenda view Vim commands Ctrl up , down –> go up and down in file q [a-z] –> record a macro Shift » –> indent in code Evil snipe: s ch : go to ch ; same as f but more letters gc : to comment using evil gs [annotation] –> to go to lines directly like vimium ease dii –> delete inside indentation dik –> delete inside plus a line above Dired buffer shortcuts: Dired marking and unmarking options: % and * keys Narrow subtree : ( Show git status for files : ) Diff one file to another: = Create a directory : + Up a directory : - Rename a file: R Change timestamp of file: T Copy filename: Y Open a sub-directory in same menu: I Change ownership of file: O Unmark all files: U Hardlink of file: H Goto file: J Counsel search online: K Encrypt, decrypt a file: ; Uncompress or compress : Z Copy file to : C Byte compile a file: B Change file mode: M Copy async to rsync : C-c C-r Wide dired mode: i Org table by copying html table: C-c | Show all project TODOs: Spc p t Scroll other window : S-up Scroll other window down : S-down Backlinks Emacs Hugo Blogging

item.title: Emacs Shortcuts
item.description: Emacs Shortcuts Spc f d –> search for files in dired Spc : –> main command Spc g s –> git status Spc n n –> Capture template Spc n a –> agenda view Vim commands Ctrl up , down –> go up and down in file q [a-z] –> record a macro Shift » –> indent in code Evil snipe: s ch : go to ch ; same as f but more letters gc : to comment using evil gs [annotation] –> to go to lines directly like vimium ease dii –> delete inside indentation dik –> delete inside plus a line above Backlinks Emacs Hugo Blogging

item.title: Photoshop
item.description: Photoshop carefulness: Active layer is to be cared. Not on bed or something control +g go back move tool by pressing V always group layers and rename them control g for group after selecting using control Never use yellow background with white text Designing a cursor to appear on the design . Selecting a hover to other text color and also the opacity to change either low or high
